sentences.en: all new cars will be required to meet this standard by 1997 at the latest.
sentences.cn: 要求所有的新车最迟于1997年前达到这一标准。

sentences.en: Billy Hicks, late of this parish
sentences.cn: 不久前故去的本教区的比利·希克斯

sentences.en: By the late eighties their number had grown fourfold.
sentences.cn: 到80年代末的时候，他们的数量已是原来的4倍。

sentences.en: Can you stay late?
sentences.cn: 你可以晚点走吗？

sentences.en: Ellen has to work late tonight.
sentences.cn: 埃伦今晚得工作到很晚。

sentences.en: Heavy Metal music really arose in the late 60s.
sentences.cn: 重金属音乐真正形成于60年代后期。

sentences.en: I'm sorry to call so late, but I need a favour.
sentences.cn: 这么晚打电话真是抱歉，可是我需要帮个忙。

sentences.en: If we turned up late we would be hammered by everybody.
sentences.cn: 如果我们迟到，就会遭到大家的声讨。

sentences.en: Most late developers will catch up with their friends.
sentences.cn: 大多数身材发育迟缓者都会赶上他们的朋友。

sentences.en: My late teens and early twenties were really rough years.
sentences.cn: 我二十岁前后那几年过得真苦啊。

sentences.en: Security forces remained on patrol until late into the night.
sentences.cn: 保安部队继续巡逻至深夜。

sentences.en: Sorry I’m late – I overslept.
sentences.cn: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.en: Stay in bed extra late or get up specially early.
sentences.cn: 起床过晚或过早。

sentences.en: Tell her I'll call her back later, I'm running late again.
sentences.cn: 告诉她我过会儿会给她回电话，我又要晚了。

sentences.en: The call-up of National Guard and reserve units begun in late August.
sentences.cn: 国民警卫队和预备役的征兵工作8月下旬开始。

sentences.en: The fighting began in the late afternoon and continued all night.
sentences.cn: 战斗在傍晚时分打响，持续了一夜。

sentences.en: The firm was owed around £300,000 by late payers.
sentences.cn: 该事务所被拖欠了约30万英镑。

sentences.en: The stores are open later on Thursdays.
sentences.cn: 商店星期四开门较晚。

sentences.en: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.cn: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.en: There are penalties if loan repayments are late.
sentences.cn: 逾期偿还贷款会被处以罚金。

sentences.en: They'd fixed yesterday that Mike'd be in late today.
sentences.cn: 他们昨天已经确定迈克今天会来晚一些。

sentences.en: Through some unfortunate accident, the information reached me a day late.
sentences.cn: 由于发生了不幸的意外，我知道消息的时候已经晚了一天。

sentences.en: was feeling better of late.
sentences.cn: 最近感觉好多了

sentences.en: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.cn: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.en: Why were spices so highly valued in late 15th-century Europe?
sentences.cn: 为什么香料在15世纪末期的欧洲如此贵重？

sentences.en: you've realized it a little late in the day.
sentences.cn: 你已经认识到了，不过为时已晚。

words.tran_cn: 晚的；迟的；已故的；最近的

phrases.tran_cn: 亡羊补牢；迟做比不做好
开花晚的植物；智力发展晚的人
在那天稍晚些时候；[口]为时太晚，失时机

phrases.phrase: late in the day (或 北美

phrases.tran_cn: 延迟装运；前批装船货物
少年晚期；20岁左右的青年男女

trans.tran_cn: 接近末期，迟的，近日暮的，已故的
trans.tran_en: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged

trans.tran_cn: 晚，迟，接近末期，临近日暮

trans.tran_en: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged
